content:
@Amol Vyas @Pat Taylor We noticed that in the STU1 version of CARIN BB EOB Inpatient the element: Item.revenue is 1..1; however in the CI build it is optional 0..1. In some cases when we are constructing Item we won't have a revenue code. Do you know, was this just a type-o in the STU1 build?

Thank you,
Joel

@Joel Hansen (Aetna) @Amol Vyas The intent is that the cardinality of item.revenue be 1..1 for inpatient and outpatient institutional claims. Are you saying that there are situations where you don't have a revenue code?
